com.delphix.masking.api.provider

Interface ComponentService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComponentWrapper

    public interface ComponentService
    This is the interface provided to masking components at setup time through which the component may acquire references to other objects and services.
    Several methods in this interface consume resource references derived from the GenericReference class. These references must be publicly visible properties of the MaskingComponent object using this service provider, or methods consuming them will fail with InvalidDependencyException. This requirement exists in order to allow the masking engine to discover the dependencies of any MaskingComponent via reflection.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstanceName

        java.lang.String getInstanceName()
        Get the name of this component instance.
        Returns:
        The component instance name.

      • openInputFile

        java.io.InputStream openInputFile(@Nonnull
                                  FileReference fileReference)
        Method to open a file resource by URI. The resulting InputStream remains valid for the life of the calling MaskingAlgorithm object, but may be closed be when no longer needed to free resources.
        Parameters:
        fileReference - A reference to the file to be opened.
        Returns:
        An InputStream for the desired file

      • openJdbcConnection

        java.sql.Connection openJdbcConnection(@Nonnull
                                       JdbcReference jdbcReference)
        Method to open a JDBC resource. The resulting Connection remains valid for the life of the calling MaskingAlgorithm object, but may be closed be when no longer needed to free resources.
        Parameters:
        jdbcReference - A JdbcReference object to provide the jdbc connection information.
        Returns:
        A Connection object.

      • getAlgorithmByName

        <U> MaskingAlgorithm<U> getAlgorithmByName(@Nonnull
                                           AlgorithmInstanceReference reference,
                                           @Nonnull
                                           MaskingAlgorithm.MaskingType type)
        Get a MaskingAlgorithm object for the algorithm specified by the reference and type. It is only possible to find named instances of component algorithms using this method. The returned MaskingAlgorithm object is fully initialized and ready to mask data.
        Type Parameters:
        U - The data type masked by the returned algorithm, must exactly match what is requested in type
        Parameters:
        reference - A reference describing the algorithm instance to get
        type - The masking data type the named algorithm is expected mask
        Returns:
        A masking algorithm object

      • getCryptoService

        CryptoService getCryptoService(KeyReference reference)
        Get a cryptographic service provider that wraps the key assigned to this component. This provider will remain valid for the life of the component object. Currently, only algorithm components may use this service.
        Parameters:
        reference - A reference to the key to use. Currently, the reference value must be "", referring to the default algorithm key assigned to this algorithm.
        Returns:
        The cryptographic service provider object.

      • getLogService

        LogService getLogService()
        Get a Logger object that can be used to log messages. The logger has a rate limitter that can be configured in the Masking engine. The rate limitter controls the number of bytes per second. Attention! The sensitive (not masked) information should never be logged!
        Returns:
        The MaskingLogService object.
